TradeLocker login details

1 Create a TradeLocker Account

  • If you donâ€™t already have a TradeLocker account, Visit TradeLocker.
  • Create an account or log in if you already have one.
  • Choose a broker/prop to trade with from the list of brokers supported by TradeLocker and sign up to it.

2 TradeLocker login details

  • After Signing up to the broker/prop you will receive an Email with the TradeLocker login details.
  • Use the same TradeLocker login details to link a TradeLocker broker in our platform.
